DocAttribute.Name: ProxyType
DocAttribute.Documentation: High level (and only) semantic meaning attached to the IfcProxy, defining the basic construct type behind the Proxy, e.g. Product or Process.

DocAttribute.Name: Tag
DocAttribute.Documentation: The tag (or label) identifier at the particular instance of a product, e.g. the serial number, or the position number. It is the identifier at the occurrence level.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The Name attribute has to be provided for a proxy.
